timeline.message: Implement String rep of API Request Body

timeline.bodyText: May want to check for a 400 invalid_grant error where the server time differs from the local time. https://developer.box.com/en/guides/api-calls/permissions-and-errors/common-errors/
timeline.author: sujaygarlanka

replies.bodyText: Yeah, per our discussion, I'm going to maintain parity with the existing SDK's functionality for now.  I created SDK-1262 for that.
replies.author: PJSimon
